entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 06:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
